data.title: JOY JOY DOWN IN MY HEART by Ernie Rettino
data.meta_description: From the album KIDS PRAISE! 3 "Funtastic Family!" - Download
data.text:
Lyrics

Kids Praise! 3

JOY JOY DOWN IN MY HEART

I’ve got that joy joy joy joy down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

I’ve got that joy joy joy joy down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart to stay

I’ve got that joy joy joy joy down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

I’ve got that joy joy joy joy down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart to stay

I’ve got the peace that passes understanding down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

I’ve got the peace that passes understanding down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart to stay

CHORUS

And I’m so happy, so very happy

I’ve got the love of Jesus in my heart

And I’m so happy, so very happy

I’ve got the love of Jesus in my heart

I’ve got the love of Jesus down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

I’ve got the love of Jesus down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart to stay

Joy joy joy joy joy joy joy joy joy jo-o-o-oy

Joy jo-o-o-o-oy

I’ve got that joy joy joy joy down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart –Where?

I’ve got that joy joy joy joy down in my heart –Where?

Down in my heart to stay

CHORUS

And I’m so happy, so very happy

I’ve got the love of Jesus in my heart

And I’m so happy, so very happy

I’ve got the love of Jesus in my heart

And I’m so happy, so very happy

I’ve got the love of Jesus in my heart

And I’m so happy, so very happy

I’ve got the love of Jesus in my heart

Bm Bm

Bm

Bm

Bm

Bm

Bm

#Bm

Bm

Ah-h-h-h-h-h
